raw_comment: I notice that the graph is animated, graph is color coded, and it goes from January through May. I wonder what the different colors on the graph represent.  In this graph it is showing the regions where spring has sprung. My title is  “Spring Has Sprung in the U.S.”
ace_sentences: I notice that the graph is animated.
I notice that the graph is color-coded.
The graph covers the period from January to May.
I wonder what the different colors on the graph represent.
The graph shows the regions where spring has sprung.
My title is "Spring Has Sprung in the U.S.".
